title: A Story About Being Nurtured By a Lolibaba Vampire And Making Out With Her - Novel Updates
tags: Adventurers   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Fantasy World   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Loli   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Older Love Interests   R-18   Vampires
author: 田島マグワイヤー
description: A newbie adventurer, Thermite, gets lost in the mountains and ends up staying with a loli-baba vampire. The two are attracted to each other, but nothing happens to them, and they gradually begin to fall in love.>
